nouns: Two or more persons trained to put out fires.

A firefighter is a rescuer extensively trained in firefighting, primarily to extinguish hazardous fires that threaten property and civilian or natural populations, and to rescue people from dangerous situations, like collapsed or burning buildings or crashed vehicles.

Someone (implied male) who is skilled in the work of fighting fire.
A member of a fire department who tries to extinguish fires
A person who is trained to put out fires.

Any of various large trucks that carry firemen and equipment to the site of a fire
Any fire apparatus, such as a fire truck or fire engine.

apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the man firefighter emoji with a medium-light skin tone is depicted with a determined expression and a sturdy, professional uniform featuring realistic shading and subtle highlights. The smooth, rounded edges of his gear and the polished helmet reflect the high-quality design Apple is known for. This emoji on Apple devices embodies courage, resilience, and the vital role of firefighters in keeping communities safe.
